attributes.action: Get shops to stop charging more for lactose free items
attributes.additional_details: As they will have the sway to bring it in and make it a legal requirement for the costs to be cut and will able fine anyone caught over charging.
attributes.background: To make retailiers and manufacturers cut the cost of what they charge for lactose free items as why should people be overcharged due to diet requirements

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for setting the price of particular products. This is a matter for individual producers and retailers, not the Government or House of Commons.
